comment: 5 speeches: Self-Intro, Current Event, Commemorative, Persuasive, and Impropmtu. Follow the guidelines and control your nervousness and you'll do fine. She grades pretty easy because she knows no one is an expert at PS. She's fun, quirky, a little bit awkward in the good way, and she feels more like a peer. Tests are easy if you take good notes.

5 Speeches: Self-Intro, Current Event, Impromptu, Commemorative, and Persuasive. 2 Tests: Mid term and final, both are pretty much common sense, she gives chapters for the study guide on the first test and an actual study guide for the final that is cumulative. Attendance is mandatory or you get points taken off. Shes quirky and nice!

(Also known as Teresa Dudenhoeffer now) She's hilarious! Take her if you can. Class is super easy. The journals are long. Don't wait till last minute to do them. However she does offer lots of extra credit.

Great professor, class not tough.  She assigns 3 journals and 4 quizes for COM 2033.  Follow her directions on the journals or she will take points off.  She is also known as Teresa Dudenhoeffer now.  I really liked her class.  I would take any class tought by her.

I took her hybrid class and it is really easy. There are 3 journals, 3 projects and 5 quizzes. She is very clear on instructions. The lectures were chill and she was open to everyone sharing their opinion. Take her!

FOLLOW DIRECTIONS and you WILL make an A! THE COOLEST! TAKE THIS CLASS!! REALLY cares about students. Always offers to help in/out of class. FUNNY! Read the chapters before the test. This is a class where if you follow the rubric, your grade will be an A. Wish I could take her over & over!! SHE IS NOT SCATTERED, her personality is quirky! love her!

THE COOLEST! TAKE THIS CLASS!! REALLY cares about students. Always offers to help in/out of class. FUNNY! FOLLOW DIRECTIONS and you WILL make an A! Read the chapters before the test. This is a class where if you follow the rubric, your grade will be an A. Wish I could take her over & over!! SHE IS NOT SCATTERED, her personality is quirky! love her!
Alvarez is awesome! Great professor that will become a great friend. She is extremely nice and caring. TAKE HER CLASS. She is so sweet.

She is hilarious and so laid-back! It was nice to take her for Public Speaking. She's a fair grader, but makes the atmosphere so chill. Tests are moderate... definitely not as hard as people are saying on here. She's a little scatterbrained, but it's part of her awkward charm. She could probably have her own television show.

She was one of the weirdest yet coolest teacher i know. she made AWKWARD remarks but made the class have fun. Tests were hard, projects were very easy. Easy class and i would def take her class if she taught another.

She's a good teacher who's very passionate about the topic.  She IS all over the place but it kept the class interesting. Tests are hard to study for but the projects are easy if you stick EXACTLY to the instructions.  Take her but don't miss class.
BEST teacher ever. Take her..

Extremely scatterbrained.I felt like each class was off subject.she litterally read off the pwrpnt and didnt clearly explain the material.Im not even sure SHE understood it.Her examples had nothing to do with what we were talking about.She used a ruberic for each project but the ruberics were never clear making it impossible to know what she wanted

Very scattered and all over the place. Sometimes she makes it seem like she has a thousand other things on her mind that do not involve this class. She is an easy teacher but you HAVE TO FOLLOW THE DIRECTIONS WORD FOR WORD or she will deduct. If you do this you will get an A. Very nice woman but tends to get WAY off subject a lot.

She's scatter brained, but she's great. She gives study guides, and her projects are ridiculously easy. She's willing to help and to take suggestions for improvement. Attendance not mandatory. She shows a lot of movies, but it's a VISUAL COM CLASS. Plus, movies in class rock! Take her, you won't regret it.

Omg. She is SO SCATTERED. The class time is poorly used by talking about random favorite thoughts, movies etc. She is not confident- she makes a lot of scrunch faces after every other word. She shows too many movies and she doesn't use powerpoint. This professor is truly UNORGANIZED. Stay away.

I really enjoyed her class.  Attendance is not mandatory, but she does not post lecture notes on line.  She is very passionate about film and this class.  If you study and do your assignments exactly as she writes them:if she says write 200-280 words don't write 300...she will deduct points.  I really enjoy this class
Awesome professor, go to class and you will do fine. She is still learning teaching techniques, but is very helpful if you don't understand something.

She is nice but knows nothing. Her response to every question is, "that's what your book says, I don't know or what do you think?" Most of the material isn't hard but the film chapter is ridiculous. She shows 100 movie clips & expects you to know what type of film editing style goes with each. She just copies what's in the book onto the board.
T.A. is an awesome teacher, relates to students. Some idiots took advantage of it (in my opinion) but she is cool and understands Public Speech is embarrassing. Take her if you can!
Loved this professor! Very helpful and lots of fun in class! Will def take another class with her!

Ms. Alvarez is the best. I took this class with little to no interest at all and she made is a thrill... It was a speech class and she made us feel very comfortable.. She's young, so she can really late to what we have to go through.. I would recommend her to anyone,book is mandatory and you will get your money's worth..Every1 should taker her!!
